subsection.name: Quick Start
subsection.p: At this moment Hippo ECM is still in an early development stage. To run it, it is necessary to checkout the sources from the SVN repository, and build them using Maven. A full guide can be found under Building with Maven. The short version below is targeted at those people who know what they are doing.

And in a different console:
~/hippo-ecm> cd application/reviewed-action/frontend ~/hippo-ecm/application/reviewed-action/frontend> mvn jetty:run-war
Finally, direct your browser to http://localhost:8082.
